card.name: Gift of Fealty
card.text: Search your library for an artifact card, a creature card, an enchantment card, and a planeswalker card, then reveal them. Target opponent chooses three of those cards. Put the chosen cards into your graveyard and the other onto the battlefield.

card.name: Long Night in the Lab
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice any number of nonland permanents. Search your library for a permanent with converted mana cost equal to the total converted mana cost of permanents sacrificed to cast Long Night in the Lab, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Mad Queen's Contract
card.text: Skip your draw step. At the beginning of your upkeep, put a card exiled with Mad Queen's Contract into your hand. Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library.

card.name: Grigorhon the Vast
card.text: Flying Whenever Grigorhon the Vast enters the battlefield or attacks, it deals 8 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or planeswalkers.

card.name: Elder of the Arbor Song
card.text: Spend only mana produced by creatures to cast Elder of the Arbor Song. At the beginning of combat on your turn, untap each creature you control. Those creatures get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Qinhana Skysailer
card.text: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.) Whenever Qinhana Skysailer attacks, create a tapped and attacking 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

card.name: Detention Officer
card.text: When Detention Officer enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent with converted mana cost 4 or less until Detention Officer leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Golem Retainer
card.text: When Golem Retainer enters the battlefield, return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield until Golem Retainer leaves the battlefield. When that artifact would leave the battlefield, exile it instead.

card.name: Count Cockatoo
card.text: Lifelink Whenever a card would be put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, exile that card instead and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Sheil, Academy Partisan
card.text: Flying, first strike, vigilance, lifelink

card.name: Aether Warp
card.text: Choose an instant or sorcery card with converted mana cost 1 in your graveyard, then do the same for instant or sorcery cards with converted mana costs 2 and 3. Cast those cards without paying their mana costs if able. If those cards would be put into your graveyard this turn, exile them instead.

card.name: Tempering Witchcraft
card.text: Counter target spell if it has converted mana cost 1. Promote {1}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its promote cost. If you do, double all numbers and number words on it. Then exile it.)

card.name: Ashscatter Drake
card.text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Flying When Ashscatter Drake enters the battlefield, return target spell to its owner's hand.

card.name: Raveria, Library Sage
card.text: As Raveria, Library Sage enters the battlefield, choose a number. {U}{U}: Counter target spell with converted mana cost equal to the chosen number.

card.name: Worldreader Djinn
card.text: Flying Tactician — Whenever you cast a spell or activate an ability that targets an opponent, draw two cards.

card.name: Hestia, Equitable Queen
card.text: Trample Whenever an opponent loses life, that player creates a 1/1 black Assassin creature token with deathtouch.

card.name: Grisly Pardoner
card.text: Chivalry 1 (At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target creature with less base power than this get +1/+1 until end of turn. If you do, this creature can't attack this turn.) Whenever Grisly Pardoner becomes chivalrous, you draw a card and lose 1 life.

card.name: Hemophage Coveter
card.text: Menace Tactician — Whenever you cast a spell or activate an ability that targets an opponent, that player sacrifices a creature.

card.name: End of an Era
card.text: Destroy all creatures.

card.name: Bathe in Blood
card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast if you control no creatures or planeswalkers. Exile target creature or planeswalker.

card.name: Puppeteer Ori
card.text: {T}: Create a token that's a copy of another target creature you control, except it has base power and toughness 1/1, has haste, and isn't legendary. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Sootmaw Sovereign
card.text: Flying {1}{R}: Sootmaw Sovereign gets +1/+0 until end of turn and deals 1 damage to target player.

card.name: Hobblin' Bomb Squad
card.text: {1}{R}, Sacrifice Hobblin' Bomb Squad: Destroy target colorless permanent. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Mirror Mastery
card.text: Create a token that's a copy of target permanent an opponent controls. It gains haste. Exile that token at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Fiery Justice
card.text: Fiery Justice deals 5 damage to any target. Promote {8}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its promote cost. If you do, double all numbers and number words on it. Then exile it.)

card.name: Gaeleth of the First Union
card.text: Gaeleth of the First Union enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other Elf creature you control. {3}{G}{G}: Elf creatures you control have base power and toughness 4/4 and gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Rootwhomper
card.text: Trample When Rootwhomper enters the battlefield, destroy target noncreature permanent.

card.name: Unflinching Forager
card.text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Unflinching Forager explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: The Ancient Awaits
card.text: Return all land cards from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. {7}{G}{G}{G}{G}{G}{G}{G}, Exile The Ancient Awaits from your graveyard: Create a 20/20 green Elemental creature token with trample.

card.name: Seismic Landslide
card.text: Return up to three target land cards from your graveyard to your hand. Discard three land cards: Return Seismic Landslide from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Forbidden Lamp
card.text: When Forbidden Lamp enters the battlefield, exile all cards from all graveyards. {X}, {T}, Sacrifice Forbidden Lamp: You may cast a card exiled with Forbidden Lamp with converted mana cost X without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Citadel Colossus
card.text: Indestructible

card.name: Statuary Crystal
card.text: Spells that target cost {2} more to cast.

card.name: Forsaken Citadel
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Forsaken Citadel: Search your library for a basic Plains, basic Swamp, or Plains Swamp card and put it onto the battlefield.

card.name: Mercurial Pinnacle
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Mercurial Pinnacle: Search your library for a basic Islands, basic Mountain, or Island Mountain card and put it onto the battlefield.

card.name: Polyp Tillage
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Polyp Tillage: Search your library for a basic Swamp, basic Forest, or Swamp Forest card and put it onto the battlefield.

card.name: Radiant Sierra
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Radiant Sierra: Search your library for a basic Mountain, basic Plains, or Mountain Plains card and put it onto the battlefield.

card.name: Blue Loon Lagoon
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Blue Loon Lagoon: Search your library for a basic Forest, basic Island, or Forest Island card and put it onto the battlefield.

card.name: Anointed Honorblade
card.text: Chivalry 2 (At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target creature with less base power than this get +2/+2 until end of turn. If you do, this creature can't attack this turn.) Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, it gains double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Handiwork Treasurer
card.text: When Handiwork Treasurer enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.

card.name: Snowfield Sentry
card.text: First strike When Snowfield Sentry enters the battlefield, if you control two or fewer lands, you may search your library for a basic Plains card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: Curio Purveyor
card.text: Vigilance Artifacts you control have "{T}: You gain 2 life."

card.name: Ouhan Shepherd
card.text: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.) When Ouhan Shepherd enters the battlefield, create three 0/1 white Goat creature tokens.

card.name: Call of the Honor Guard
card.text: Choose two — • Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. • Creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn. • Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

card.text: Other Knights you control enter the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on them. {1}{W}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target Knight this turn.

card.name: Without a Trace
card.text: Exile target creature if its converted mana cost is 2 or less. Promote {4}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its promote cost. If you do, double all numbers and number words on it. Then exile it.)

card.name: Paramount Valor
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has base power and toughness 4/4 and has lifelink.

card.name: Basilisk Trainer
card.text: Creatures you control with flying get +0/+1. When Basilisk Trainer enters the battlefield, draw a card if you control a creature with flying.

card.name: Skilled Animator
card.text: When Skilled Animator enters the battlefield, target artifact you control becomes an artifact creature with base power and toughness 5/5 for as long as Skilled Animator remains on the battlefield.

card.name: Prophetic Drake
card.text: Flying When Prophetic Drake enters the battlefield, choose a player. Prophetic Drake's power is equal to the number of instant and sorcery cards the chosen player owns in exile and in that player's graveyard.

card.name: Belle of the Ball
card.text: When Belle of the Ball enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.) Whenever Belle of the Ball becomes the target of a spell, sacrifice it.

card.name: Sleet Screamer
card.text: Flying Whenever a creature you control explores, tap target creature you don't control. It doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

card.name: Take the Bait
card.text: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn and blocks this turn if able. Promote {2}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its promote cost. If you do, double all numbers and number words on it. Then exile it.)

card.text: Return up to two target exiled cards with promote you own to your hand.

card.name: Drakeform
card.text: Target creature has base power and toughness 2/2 until end of turn. Promote {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its promote cost. If you do, double all numbers and number words on it. Then exile it.)

card.name: Peruse
card.text: Look at target player's hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player reveals that card, puts it on the bottom of their library, then draws a card. Draw a card.

card.text: Deathtouch {B}, {T}: Another target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: Plague Study

card.name: Palpate Riches
card.text: Add two mana in any combination of different colors. Draw a card.

card.name: Touch of Hysteria
card.text: Target creature gets +1/-1 until end of turn. Promote {3}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its promote cost. If you do, double all numbers and number words on it. Then exile it.)

card.name: Primordial Roar
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+1 and gains trample until end of turn. Promote {3}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its promote cost. If you do, double all numbers and number words on it. Then exile it.)

card.name: Qinhana Cavalry
card.text: Chivalry 3 (At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target creature with less base power than this get +3/+3 until end of turn. If you do, this creature can't attack this turn.)

card.name: Sparring Campaigner
card.text: Chivalry 2 (At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target creature with less base power than this get +2/+2 until end of turn. If you do, this creature can't attack this turn.)

card.name: Migratory Elk
card.text: Trample When Migratory Elk enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Elvish Trailblazer
card.text: When Elvish Trailblazer enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Flora Hermit
card.text: {T}: Add {G}.

card.name: Grove Stomper
card.text: When Grove Stomper enters the battlefield, you may discard a land card. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Grove Stomper.

card.name: Timber Titan
card.text: Timber Titan gets +6/+6 as long as there are two or more land cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Nesting Spiders
card.text: Reach When Nesting Spiders enters the battlefield, create two 1/2 green Spider creature tokens with reach.

card.name: Mossy Snagtooth
card.text: {1}{G}: Tap Mossy Snagtooth. It gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Fierce Combatant
card.text: Fierce Combatant can't be blocked by more than one creature.

card.name: Dowsing Baobab
card.text: When Dowsing Baobab enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library, then put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest back on top in a random order.

card.name: True Volley
card.text: True Volley deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures with flying.

card.name: Chomp
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

card.name: Travel By Night
card.text: Untap target creature. It gets +1/+2 and gains hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Branchbashing
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample.

card.name: Reclaimed Acreage
card.text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards and reveal them. Put one into your hand and the other into your graveyard, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Botany Experiment
card.text: You gain 1 life for each land card in your graveyard. Promote {2}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its promote cost. If you do, double all numbers and number words on it. Then exile it.)

card.name: Heroic Ride
card.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn. Promote {3}{W}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its promote cost. If you do, double all numbers and number words on it. Then exile it.)

card.name: Quivering Strix
card.text: Quivering Strix gets +2/+0 as long as you control a white creature. Quivering Strix has flying as long as you control a blue creature.

card.name: Leaky Chronicle
card.text: When Leaky Chronicle enters the battlefield, each player may surveil 1. (To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.) (Look at the top one cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

card.name: Training Rapier
Inexorable Chariot
card.text: Whenever Inexorable Chariot deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Halcyon Colossus
card.text: Crew 5 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 5 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Traveler's Amulet
card.text: {1}, Sacrifice Traveler's Amulet: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Thopter MVA
card.text: Flying

card.name: Thopter MVA
card.text: Flying
